config:vue

Summary:

vue.config.js

Source:
vue.config.js, line 1
Properties
Name Type Default Description
outputDir String dist

Output directory of compiled Vue bundle.
assetsDir String media

Assets will be referenced using /media as the base URL.

Requires

  • module:path
  • module:TodoWebpackPlugin

Methods

(static) chainWebpack(config) Method

Summary:

Pass config opts to webpack.

Source:
vue.config.js, line 46

config.plugins

Disable preload/prefetch directives in link elements

config.plugins.delete('preload');
config.plugins.delete('prefetch');

config.module

vue-markdown-loader converts Markdown files to Vue components.

config.module.rule('md')
     .test(/\.md/)
     .use('vue-loader')
     .loader('vue-loader')
     .end()
     .use('vue-markdown-loader')
     .loader('vue-markdown-loader/lib/markdown-compiler')
     .options({ raw: true });
Parameters
Name Type Description
config Object

Configuration object to pass to Webpack.
